enableTouchROI.description: Enable Flag for Touch ROI AEC Adjustments

weightTouchROI.description: Specify the blending weight of Touch luma into metered luma

weightTemporalFilter.description: Temporal weight for Touch Luma and Metered luma transition. Higher weight will have faster transition to Touch Luma

centerWeightStrength.description: Specify weighting of luma in the center of Touch ROI

enableTouchLEDMetering.description: Enable flag for LED metering during touch

enableTouchROIHistAdj.description: Enable Flag for adjustment on Histogram AEC target calculation

darkLumaRatioRange.description: The ratio between ROI and frame luma to determine if an ROI is dark ROI.

minTargetAdjRatio.description: This value overrides the minimal target adjust ratio in normal histogram AEC.

maxTargetAdjRatio.description: This value overrides the maximal target adjust ratio in normal histogram AEC.

darkRefLow.description: This value overrides the darkRefLow in normal histogram AEC.

satRefHigh.description: This value overrides the satRefHigh in normal histogram AEC.

brightLumaRatioRange.description: The ratio between ROI and frame luma to determine if an ROI is bright ROI.

minTargetAdjRatio.description: This value overrides the minimal target adjust ratio in normal histogram AEC.

maxTargetAdjRatio.description: This value overrides the maximal target adjust ratio in normal histogram AEC.

darkRefLow.description: This value overrides the darkRefLow in normal histogram AEC.

satRefHigh.description: This value overrides the satRefHigh in normal histogram AEC.

convSpeedAdjRatio.description: specify the adjustment of convergence speed during touch AEC convergence
